name: Captcha

properties1.name: name
properties1.description: (mandatory) is the unique name of the field.

properties3.name: label
properties3.description: (mandatory) (translatable) is the descriptive title of the field.

properties4.name: description
properties4.example: We do not like spam, please show us you are human
properties4.description: (optional) (translatable) is text that will be shown as a tooltip when the user moves the mouse over the drop-down box.

properties5.name: namespace
properties5.description: (optional) the component name seems to work

description: The Captcha field type that integrates with a Joomla captcha plugin to present a human verification challenge, typically used to distinguish between human users and automated systems.
